title: A Monkey Crossed the Tree
bodyText: Today, a monkey grew enough balls to swing across to the next tree. Amazing.

title: A Turtle Ate a Cat
bodyText: Turtle makes headlines by swallowing a cat whole. He apparently didn't give a rats ass.

title: Humans Begin Mass Exodus to Canada
bodyText: After Trump wins the election, it's clear that American's are out of their minds.

title: Countless Pennies Lost
bodyText: Pennies are tossed out in to the street when people realize that they're poisonous to the mind.

title: Mummies Responsible for LA Deaths
bodyText: The mummified remains of an unknown assailant was seen slashing and biting his or her way through Downtown Los Angeles.
